title: Porta Napoli
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Neapolitan pizzeria. Reported these are vegan suitable: the marinara (tomato sauce, oregano, garlic, basil, olive oil), the gluten-free marinara, and the vegetariana (tomato sauce, artichokes, mushrooms, grape tomatoes, basil, zucchini, eggplant, olive oil). Be sure to specify no parmesan, etc. just to be sure.
